## LinearCardContainer class

Base class for card containers that store their contents as an ordered list of cards, like hands and decks.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare abstract class LinearCardContainer<TCard extends Card> extends CardContainer<TCard> implements Iterable<TCard> 
```
**Extends:** [CardContainer](./bge-core.cardcontainer.md)<!-- -->&lt;TCard&gt;

**Implements:** Iterable&lt;TCard&gt;

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(CardType, kind, orientation, autoSort)](./bge-core.linearcardcontainer._constructor_.md) |  | Base class for card containers that store their contents as an ordered list of cards, like hands and decks. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoSort?](./bge-core.linearcardcontainer.autosort.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [CardComparer](./bge-core.cardcomparer.md)<!-- -->&lt;TCard&gt; | _(Optional)_ Comparison function to use to automatically sort added cards. |
|  [count](./bge-core.linearcardcontainer.count.md) | <code>readonly</code> | number |  |
|  [defaultOrientation](./bge-core.linearcardcontainer.defaultorientation.md) |  | [CardOrientation](./bge-core.cardorientation.md) | Default orientation of cards added to this container. |
|  [footprint](./bge-core.linearcardcontainer.footprint.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [Footprint](./bge-core.footprint.md) |  |
|  [selected](./bge-core.linearcardcontainer.selected.md) | <code>readonly</code> | ReadonlyArray&lt;TCard&gt; | Gets all cards in this container that are marked as selected. |
|  [unselected](./bge-core.linearcardcontainer.unselected.md) | <code>readonly</code> | ReadonlyArray&lt;TCard&gt; | Gets all cards in this container that aren't marked as selected. |
